Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
あの後のスーパーでも同じことになった。ちょっと気まずくて、しばらくはあの商店街には行けないな。
……まあ、猫が可愛いと話されれば当然のことだよね。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「そのあたりからreallyいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、結構香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
顔を向けた方角へ。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」

[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、猫のたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
ショコラ: "Become a good girl!"  
バニラ: "Shigure, you're too strict. But thanks to you, I learned a lot."  
店主: "Is that so? You must be a wonderful master."  
ショコラ: "Ah, but the master is the master!"  
ショコラ: "And Shigure-chan is just Shigure-chan! Right, master?"  
バニラ: "In other words, Shigure is an important friend to me."  
バニラ: "Calling someone 'master' is only for my master, you know."  
店主: "Hehe. You're so loved, I see, master?"  
嘉祥: "Well, it's certainly a kind thing to say."  
He gets poked lightly in the ribs.  
He replies with an embarrassed smile.  
...It would be even more embarrassing outside.

As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Indeed, um..."
He takes the invoice and pen offered with a bright smile.
[Kashou]: "...Actually, it seems like I might have ordered something different."
[Tableware Vendor]: "...Eh? Really?"
[Tableware Vendor]: "Is that so... you mean the item is different?"
[Kashou]: "No, it does look like what I ordered is here..."
His gaze shifts to the stacked cardboard boxes in the store.
A mountain of cardboard boxes filled the small shop—box after box.
The space was almost entirely consumed by them.
[Kashou]: "As you can see, we don't need this many dishes at all..."
[Tableware Vendor]: "Oh no! I'll check with headquarters right away!"
[Tableware Vendor]: "Would it be alright if you wait a moment?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Dish Vendor]: "It seems your order got mixed up with another one..."
[Dish Vendor]: "I imagine Mr. Minaduki might need these urgently..."
[Dish Vendor]: "If it's convenient, I'd like to offer you the dishes from this order."
[Kashou]: "Receive the ordered items...?"
[Kashou]: "...Eh? From among these?"
Mountain of towering cardboard boxes.
He freezes mid-sentence.
They're all identical boxes after all.
One can't tell what's inside until opening them.
Moreover, upon checking the invoices, they're all top-tier teaware and dishes.
So, one must be extremely careful in handling them to avoid any major mishaps.
[Kashou]: "Well, I'd certainly appreciate receiving these today since we're preparing for the grand opening..."
[Kashou]: "...But taking all of this right now... it would take quite some time, wouldn't it?"

昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "...I wish I could live as simply as a cat. Things would probably be easier that way."
While looking at the shop name written on the window, he forced a faint smile and began to clean up the tea set that had just arrived.

Vanilla: "Hey, today that takoyaki stand is missing."

The same afternoon in the park street as yesterday. However, there were no stalls visible today.
He wanted to send the cats back home, but there was no one around on this particular day.
He had also forgotten to bring the key to his parents' house.
So he went shopping for the time being until Shigure returned.

Chocola: "...Eh? Ah, sorry Vanilla!"

Chocola: "What was it again... Matatabi?"
Vanilla: "Something like that."

困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just a little..."  
Chocola: "But it's really okay. I'm sorry for worrying you, Master."  
Minaduki Kashou: "...It’s not like I’m making you apologize."  
He lowers his head with an exasperated smile.  
He knows exactly why she feels this way. That’s why he can only stay silent.  
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, there’s a bench right there. Why don’t you rest for a bit?"  
Vanilla: "Then I’ll go buy something to drink."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Sure, get it for everyone."  
Vanilla: "Understood. Got it."  
He hands Vanilla some coins and gestures for Chocola to sit on the bench. A strong sea breeze rustles through the trees in the park.

[Shigure]: 「I will always come and visit you, Nii-sama. I'll be cheering you on.」

[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Thanks to Shigure, the number of customers has actually exceeded expectations at times."
Shigure tilts her head with a small smile in response. If I were going to say more, she would have just told me directly already. That kind of straightforwardness is part of what makes Shigure so distinctly herself.

[Shigure]: "I understand what Master is saying..."
[Shigure]: "But cats are smart creatures after all. They can become companions not only to humans but also to other pets."
[Shigure]: "...which is precisely why"
She takes a brief pause, then looks at me with a troubled smile.
[Shigure]: "...it must be lonely for you too, being unable to rely on anyone yourself?"
Her smile sends a sharp pang through my chest.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure frowns while looking at her phone screen.  
She glances at the unmoving Shigure and deduces the caller's identity.  
[Kashou]: "It’s probably from home. Hurry up."  

Shigure remains silent. Her grip tightens on the phone as it stops ringing. Both remain quiet.  

[Shigure]: "...Is it because I’m still a young girl?"  
[Shigure]: "...Or perhaps because I’m too naive?"  
[Shigure]: "...So, am I supposed to obey whatever my father and mother say?"  
[Shigure]: "...I want to stay here."  
[Shigure]: "At least... just be by his side when he’s suffering..."

[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "I don't know where the other hospitals are... and there's no one around to ask for directions..."  
Vanilla: "But I can't just go back like this... what should I do?"  
They clasp hands tightly, nervous.  
Looking up at the cold shutter, Vanilla bites her lower lip tightly.  

Officer: "What are you two doing?"  
Chocola: "...Police officer!"  
Chocola: "Could you tell me where an open hospital is?! My master is in trouble, and I want to call a doctor!"  
Vanilla: "The hospitals are closed... I don't know what to do..."  
Officer: "Your owner? That's tough... but..."  
Officer: "What about your Bell? Don't you have it on you?"  
Chocola & Vanilla: "...Ah!"  
They instinctively touch their necks, realizing they're being pointed out.

晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。

つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
頭がついて来てくれない。
[Shigure]: "Good morning, Brother-sama"
[Shigure]: "I've been thinking about this matter quite a bit."
A bright and cheerful smile without a cloud.
The other cats are also smiling at me in the same way.
While feeling cold sweat running down my back,
[Kashou]: "Haa... Thinking about it, what exactly..."
He manages to say only that much.
[Shigure]: "From this incident, I've realized how unreasonable it is to ask Brother-sama to push himself."
[Shigure]: "But as a sister, I also couldn't sleep at night worrying about him..."
[Shigure]: "Therefore, increasing personnel and reducing Brother-sama's burden would be the best course of action, which I have considered."
[Kashou]: "...Haa"

言いながら、時雨がラッピングされた小箱を取りだした。
[淡雪]: 「あら、なにかしら？」
[時雨]: 「写真立てです。前に、大きいのが欲しいとおっしゃっていたので」
[淡雪]: 「あらあら、嬉しいわ！　いいのかしら、いいのかしら？　ありがとう、時雨！」
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Hah... The dishes are good for sure, but this tea... Such a heavenly aroma~ The flavor is bursting in my mouth. Your tea choices are second to none, May-chan♪」
[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」
[Maple]: 「And with a glass teapot, you get to enjoy the sight of the flower petals mixed with the tea leaves dancing around in the water.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Fantastic~ Absolutely fantastic, May-chan~♪ Cinnamon is drooliiiing~...!」
[Shigure]: 「Mother, I'd like to say it once more: Happy birthday to you.」
Shigure pulls out a small gift-wrapped box as she speaks.
[Awayuki]: 「My, my, what could it be?」
[Shigure]: 「A picture frame. I got it because you mentioned that you wanted a big one before.」
[Awayuki]: 「My, oh my, this is wonderful! Are you sure? Are you positive? Thank you, Shigure!」
ModelAnswer:

MAPLE: "For parties, strongly scented teas work well. Today it's champagne flavor."

MAPLE: "If we use a glass teapot, you can also enjoy watching the petals dance in the water with the tea leaves."

SINAMON: "Best~! Best ever, Maple-chan~! Cinnamon is getting all flustered~uuu...!"

SHIGURE: "Mother, please allow me to say—happy birthday!"

As she said this, Shigure took out a wrapped small box.

AWAYUKI: "Hmm? Something like that?"

SHIGURE: "It's a photo frame. You mentioned before you wanted a bigger one."

AWAYUKI: "Oh my... How thoughtful! I wonder if it's okay... is it really okay? Thank you, Shigure!"

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってもらえると……。でも、近いうちに持ってくるよ」

reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「You've always been the type to forget about everything else when you get focused on one thing, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know what to say.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm glad to hear you say that... Still, I'll bring you a proper present sometime soon.」

嘉祥: "I have no words to respond with."

Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
Narration: "I receive compliments from customers, but I get strangely flustered when my mother says them."  

Narration: "The cats also had gleaming eyes."  

[Chocola]: "It's wonderful, master~!"  
[Vanilla]: "Good."  
[Azuki]: "Well, since I helped, I wanted to see the finished product."  
[Maple]: "They really put effort into it."  
[Cinnamon]: "Mmm, looks delicious... *jururi*"  
[Coconut]: "It's amazing... so cute. It would be a shame to eat it!"  
[Awayuki]: "Honestly. I don't want to cut it up—it feels like a waste."  
[Awayuki]: "I'd keep it in my room forever."  
[Shigure]: "I understand, Mother!"  
[Awayuki]: "...Right?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "If you do that, it won't be edible... shall I cut it for you?"  
Shigure: "That's right. There's no other way; please do, Maple."  
Maple: "Sakusaku-saku..."  
Maple inserts a knife into the cake and quickly cuts it into pieces.  
Awayuki: "Ahh..."  
Awayuki: "It seems those cats have become quite skilled. Their knife handling is like a pro's."  
Shigure: "Because I work at the shop, I'm already a professional, Mother."  
Awayuki: "Oh, you're right! Hahaha... You're so reliable."  
After finishing cutting the cake, that was when—  
A sound of the front door opening could be heard.  
Shigure: "Huh?!"  
Awayuki: "Ahh, this way of opening the door isn't like Father's. He seems to have come back early today."

Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
Coconut stiffens with nervousness.  
The cats also hold their breath in silence.  
[Suhama]: "……Hmph."  
This man is none other than my father—Minaduki Suhama.  
[Shigure]: "Uh, Father… shouldn’t you have been at the Chamber of Commerce meeting tonight?"  
[Suhama]: "That’s true… but I returned home anyway. Is there something inconvenient about that?"  
[Shigure]: "...No, not really."  
[Chocola]: "Ah! The master’s father has come back!"  
[Vanilla]: "The master’s father arrived earlier than expected."  
[Coconut]: "Oh, Father, welcome home!"  
[Suhama]: "Hmph."  
[Maple]: "...This doesn’t look good at all."

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
[Awayuki]: "It was so nice. It's been a while since it was this lively."  
[Awayuki]: "Father, why don't you sit down? Kashou's cake looks absolutely delicious, doesn't it?"  
[Shigure]: "Oh, right! Father, today let's have the older brother's cake!"  
[Shigure]: "If we eat it, we'll definitely be able to tell that the older brother put his heart into making this!"  
I couldn't help but hold my breath. Would Father actually eat the cake I made? What would he say?  
[Chocola]: "Agreed! Eating Master's delicious cake will make everyone get along so well!"  
[Vanilla]: "No doubt about it."  
[Coconut]: "Yeah, yeah! The older brother's cake is really that good!"

Dad leaves the room.

Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。
[嘉祥]: 「持ってきてくれたのか、バニラ」
[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah..."
I had left the house key and wallet inside my bag, forgetting them entirely.
Before I knew it, I was standing in a park at night.
Kashou: "...What am I doing?"
Chocola: "...Master"
Kashou: "Chocola!"
Vanilla: "Master, you forgot something."
Vanilla held up my bag.
Kashou: "Did you bring it back, Vanilla?"
Vanilla: "Of course. Camping outdoors would be troublesome."
Kashou: "That's true."
Without the key, not only I but also the two others wouldn't have been able to get home.

大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「I do appreciate you saying that, but still...」
[Shigure]: 「In fact, it is my purpose in life. My nourishment, my essential nutrients, my water, air, and sunlight.」
While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.

[Shigure]: 「Hngh... Yes, I suppose. Though, I'm not sure if that is a compliment or a deflection...」

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I have something I need to discuss with my suppliers. It's not urgent, but it would be better to call them sooner rather than later."

This is just a normal thing for a privately-run pastry shop, but I handle negotiations with each supplier myself.

Even ingredients that aren't widely distributed can sometimes be obtained in bulk if you approach the right farmers.

The pursuit of flavor was also a journey to find the right ingredients.

Since everyone else is excited about sightseeing, it would be inappropriate to discuss work now. So I told them I had personal matters and left the room.

Just to be safe, I stepped out from the inn as well and found a quiet place to talk.

He picked up the phone.

[Kashou]: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"

[Kashou]: "Huh…"

The other party was surprised because it's an order from abroad, but they seem to be able to ship it after all.

He returned to the inn.

[Vanilla]: 「Master, that's not true.」
[Maple]: 「Even with catgirls, if it's not your forte, then it's not your forte. Like, take Cinnamon. Give her a paddle and she'll whiff immediately.」
[Vanilla]: 「And Chocola tries to catch the ball with her hands.」
[Kashou]: 「Interesting.」
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else while these two duked it out in ping-pong, then.
[Kashou]: 「Now that I think of it, seeing you two together is a rare sight.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I'm sorry. Did I bother you?"  
Maple: "What are you talking about? This is just a game, after all."  
Vanilla: "You said it was serious earlier..."  
Maple: "Ugh... Next time. Next time for real."  
It seems that Vanilla had managed to stop the rally just now.  

Minaduki Kashou: "I couldn't see the ball at all. Cats really are amazing, huh?"  
Vanilla: "Master, that's not quite right."  
Maple: "Even cats have ones they don't like? Like Cinnamon, who keeps swinging and missing..."  
Vanilla: "Chocola catches it with her hands."  
Minaduki Kashou: "...I see."  
So Chocola and Cinnamon had gone off somewhere else, leaving these two to compete.  

Minaduki Kashou: "Hmm... It's rare for just Maple and Vanilla to be here."

reference_answer:

[Maple]: 「I admit that I was surprised at how capable you were, but you should still be a far cry from my skills.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Oh, Cinnamon is calling us.」
[Maple]: 「Huh?」
And the moment that Maple's eyes go astray—
[Vanilla]: 「Wide open!」
With a loud 'tic' of the ball being ricocheted across the table, Vanilla serves an ace over Maple.
[Vanilla]: 「Victory.」
ModelAnswer:

[Vanilla]: "Sometimes you just have to play with them."  
[Maple]: "That's my line as the senior!"  
[Vanilla]: "Fufu... I haven't said anything about going all out yet."  
[Maple]: "No way!? No, that can't be..."  
[Maple]: "Though I was surprised Vanilla's pretty handy, I should still be faster than her."  
[Vanilla]: "...Ah, Cinnamon's calling me."  
[Maple]: "Huh?"  

At the moment Maple looked away—  
[Vanilla]: "Opening!"  
*Crack!* The sound of a ball hitting echoed as Vanilla's service ace was sealed.  
[Vanilla]: "Victory."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Hmm, I'll try one of these."  
Bought a hot spring manju at the street stall.  
It's freshly made and piping hot.  
Taking a bite, it's soft and fluffy—much more moist than I expected.  
The filling melts on my tongue, spreading sweetness gradually.  
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah... huhuhu... This is delicious."  
Both the Western sweets I make and the traditional Japanese confections from my family never involve serving warm items.  
Eating a steaming hot manju while saying 'huhuhu' was, in its own way, an interesting experience.  
Minaduki Kashou: "By the way, even though I've visited the hot spring area several times... I've never actually eaten one before."  
Back then, there were no cats around.  
When traveling with my parents and Shigure, we never ended up buying any.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hey, I didn't know you were here, Shigure. Maybe there's something you need?"  
Shigure: "No, it's fine now."  
Kashou: "Maybe it was a work call for you too?"  
Shigure: "...H, yes. Sorry. Right in the middle of our trip."  
Kashou: "Don't apologize for that. La Soleil is closed today anyway, but the outside world isn't."  
I didn't hear much detail, but Shigure runs a company. With her income, she buys clothes for the cats and sponsors their exams. Her father is strict with me, but he's lenient toward his younger sister, Shigure. He lets her handle both cat-related matters and business freely.  
Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves in their own ways—table tennis, games... even shopping at the store."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」
[時雨]: 「カラオケルームがあるそうですよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「カラオケか……高校時代に、ちょっと行ったきりだな。時雨、歌えるのか？」
[時雨]: 「幼少期に合唱をやっていましたから、少しは」
そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "That was good. …Brother, why don’t we play together without the sister complex once in a while?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Sure, but what are we doing?"  
Shigure: "I heard there’s a karaoke room."  
Kashou: "Karaoke… I went to one once during high school. Shigure, can you sing?"  
Shigure: "I did choir when I was young, so a little."  

It came to this.  
Shigure: "Then, with feelings for my brother…"  
She began singing, and the atmosphere completely changed.  
Shigure: "～～～♪"  
Kashou: "...Wow."  
Shigure: "Haa~~, it’s been a while since I let out such a big voice."  
Kashou: "You’re amazing!"  

To be honest, she was pro-level. I gave her enthusiastic applause.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「そんなに兄様に褒めていただけるなんて……幸福の極みです」
[時雨]: 「私の歌が、兄様に喜んでいただけるなんて……この声が……兄様の記憶に……はぁ、はぁ……」
[時雨]: 「うっ……鼻血が……」

２人でカラオケに来て、歌わないというわけにもいかないか。抜群に上手い時雨のあとでは、つらいものがあるが……
[嘉祥]: 「えーっと……新しめの曲だと、留学してたときに覚えたやつが……」
リストを探してみる。

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I never expected you to give me such ample praise... I am absolutely thrilled.」
[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "To be praised so much by my big brother... it's the height of happiness."
Shigure: "That my song could make my big brother happy... this voice of mine... into his memories... haa, haa..."
Shigure: "Uu... nosebleed..."
Kashou: "Oi, oi, are you okay?"
Shigure: "Uuuu... if it's alright with you, next time let my big brother sing instead."
Kashou: "Uu... wa, I see."
We came to a karaoke place together, and not singing wouldn't do. After Shigure's absolutely perfect performance, there was this...
Kashou: "Ehh... maybe something newer? There's one I learned while abroad..."
Looking through the list.
Kashou: "Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was a pretty popular song though?"

Yeah, I don't think I can get to sleep.
I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.
The inn has its lamps on at night, but once I leave the area, I'm greeted by rural darkness.
Depending on the spot, it's dark enough that I can't even tell where it is I'm standing.
This hot spring district is usually bustling with tourists during the day, but in the wee hours of the night, it has a completely different atmosphere.
I peer down from the bridge.
Darkness.
All I can hear is the sound of the running river.
I feel I can make out the moon's reflection on the water's surface... No, wait, is that just a street light?
I peer deeper below the bridge to confirm.

I made sure not to make any noise as I left the room.
The inn has a constant light, but once you leave it, it's the countryside night.
In some places, the darkness is so thick you can barely see your own feet.
The hot spring town that was bustling with tourists during the day now feels completely different at midnight.
I look down from the bridge.
It's pitch black.
Only the sound of water flowing in the river could be heard.
A moon reflection seemed to shimmer on the water... or maybe it was just the streetlight?
To check, I peeked under the bridge.

[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」

Azuki: "Is your worry still about those convenience store sweets?"
Kashou: "No, no, that's already settled now."
Kashou: "But lately, I’ve been thinking back on everything... and wondering what’s missing from me."
Azuki: "What do you mean by 'everything' about Kashou?"
Kashou: "...After graduating university, I went to study in France."
Kashou: "Right after graduation, continuing the family business without any options felt unsatisfying. I wanted to broaden my perspective."
Kashou: "Please don’t misunderstand... it’s not that I dislike Minaduki’s wagashi, you know?"

I pat my own face down.
[Maple]: 「Tee hee...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」

Maple uses her fingertip to stroke around my mouth.

The origin of my Western sweets is France. My master runs a pastry shop in Paris.

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それに……留学していた頃は……兄様がずっと戻ってこない可能性も、ありましたから」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、なるほど」
俺が洋菓子の道に進んだことで、父親との仲は冷えこんでいた。
留学が終わっても、パリに留まるという可能性も、充分にあったわけだ。
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、日本で店を開くことは、決めていたんだが……」
[時雨]: 「何か理由があるのでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり……親父から逃げた、なんて思われたくなかった。俺にも意地がある」
[嘉祥]: 「あと、師匠に言われたんだよ。ちゃんと父親と話し合ったほうがいい。日本に戻りなさい、って」
[時雨]: 「師匠様が……」
[嘉祥]: 「今では、師匠の味を、俺の生まれ故郷の街に伝えるのも、けっこう意味のあることだと思ってる」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Also... when you were still studying abroad... there was a chance that you would never come back to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I see now.」
By going down the path of a Western sweets maker, my relationship with my dad soured.
Even when my study abroad was over, there was still a big possibility that I would stay in Paris.
[Kashou]: 「Well, by that time, I made up my mind to open my shop in Japan...」
[Shigure]: 「Was there any reason behind that decision?」
[Kashou]: 「Well... I didn't want people to think that I ran away from Dad. I have my pride.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, my mentor told me to. She said that I should talk it out with my dad and return to Japan.」
[Shigure]: 「Your mentor...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I think that was really important in bringing my mentor's distinct flavor over to the town I was born and raised in.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "And... when I was abroad, there was also the possibility that my older brother might never return."

Kashou: "Oh, I see."
Because I chose to pursue Western confectionery, my relationship with Father had grown distant.
Even after finishing my studies abroad, it was quite possible for me to stay in Paris.

Kashou: "As far as I'm concerned, opening a shop in Japan was something I decided on..."
Shigure: "Is there some reason behind that?"
Kashou: "Well... I didn't want people to think I ran away from Father. I have my own pride."
Kashou: "Also, my master told me that it would be better for me to talk things over with Father and return to Japan."

Shigure: "Master..."
Kashou: "Nowadays, I also believe there's meaning in introducing Master's taste to the town where I was born."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[嘉祥]: 「さて、そろそろ行こうか。クレープは入りそうかい？」
[時雨]: 「もちろんです、兄様！　はむ！」
[嘉祥]: 「気をつけろよ、時雨。パリは危険な街だからな」
[時雨]: 「え？　は、はい……」
[嘉祥]: 「油断してると、あっという間に体重が増えるぞ。美味しい物がいっぱいあるからな！」
[時雨]: 「ひぇ……」
[嘉祥]: 「ごくり……」
お昼近く――営業時間を待って、俺は店の前まで来た。
約束は取り付けてあるとはいえ……やっぱり、緊張する。
[時雨]: 「まぁ、素敵です！　ここが、本家ラ・ソレイユなのですね、兄様？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Indeed!」
[Kashou]: 「Now then, it's about time we get going. Got room for crepes?」
[Shigure]: 「Of course, Nii-sama! Nom!」
[Kashou]: 「Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? Y-Yes, I will...」
[Kashou]: 「If you don't keep up your guard, you'll end up gaining weight before you know it. There's a whole lot of tasty things to be had here!」
[Shigure]: 「Eep...」
[Kashou]: 「Gulp...」
Nearly lunchtime— After waiting for normal business hours, I find myself in front of the shop.
I know that I've made plans, but... I'm still getting nervous.
[Shigure]: 「My, it's splendid! So this is the original La Soleil, isn't it, Nii-sama?!」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Hai!"
Kashou: "Well then, I think it's time we headed out. Are you going to get a crepe?"
Shigure: "Of course, Onee-sama! Hamu!"
Kashou: "Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city, you know."
Shigure: "Eh? Ha... hai..."
Kashou: "If you're not careful, your weight will just keep increasing. There's so much delicious food here after all!"
Shigure: "Eee..."
Kashou: "Guriku..."
Near lunchtime――after waiting for the store to open, I arrived in front of the shop.
Even though we had made an appointment... I was still nervous.
Shigure: "Maa, it's nice! This is La Soleil's main branch, Onee-sama?"

[嘉祥]: 「うーん……学生のお客さんもいるけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり、主婦が一番多いかな。子連れのお母さんも、よく来るよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You've told me about this place so many times in the past, but... I can't believe I'm finally getting to visit.」
[Shigure]: 「This is sacred ground to me. This whole thing feels like a pilgrimage.」
[Kashou]: 「...Does it?」
[Kashou]: 「Where I studied abroad is close to here, so it's got a lot of nostalgia for me. Kind of like I'm back for the first time in a while.」
[Shigure]: 「Ah, your old school is nearby, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, a few minutes down this street, in fact.」
[Shigure]: 「In that case, are a lot of the customers here at the original La Soleil students?」
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... They have their fair share of students, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I'd say housewives are the biggest group of customers. A lot of mothers come with their kids, too.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "I had heard from Brother-sama a few times... but I finally managed to visit."  
Shigure: "For me, this is a holy place. Truly, I feel like I'm on a pilgrimage."  
Kashou: "...So that's how it is?"  
Kashou: "I guess because my study abroad location is nearby, it feels nostalgic for me. Like I've returned home."  
Shigure: "Brother-sama's study abroad destination is this close, then?"  
Kashou: "Yeah, just a few minutes' walk down this street."  
Shigure: "So the customers at the main La Soleil are mostly students, right?"  
Kashou: "Hmm... there are some student customers too..."  
Kashou: "But honestly, I think housewives come here the most. Mothers with kids also visit quite often."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「フランスでは、食事のときにケーキを食べるのは、ごく普通のことだ」
[嘉祥]: 「一般家庭でも、夕飯は――サラダ、スープ、パン、魚料理、肉料理、チーズ、デザート……みたいに出すからな」
どのくらい皿数を出すかは、各家庭によるが。
[時雨]: 「毎日がフランス料理ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、ほとんど毎日のようにケーキを食べる人も、そう珍しくないんだよ」
[時雨]: 「ふむふむ……なるほど……」
[時雨]: 「なんだか、不思議な感じがします。ご家庭でコース料理だなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや……日本の一般的な家庭料理だって、別の国の人からしたら、まるで懐石料理だよ」
[嘉祥]: 「お茶、お米、味噌汁、惣菜、肉魚……使っている皿の数には、大差ないだろ？」
[時雨]: 「言われてみれば……！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "In France, it's quite normal to eat cake during meals."  
Kashou: "Even in ordinary households, dinner is often served like a salad, soup, bread, fish dish, meat dish, cheese... and dessert. The number of dishes varies by family, though."  
Minaduki Shigure: "So every day is French cuisine?"  
Kashou: "That's why people who eat cake almost daily aren't really that unusual anymore."  
Shigure: "Hmm... I see..."  
Shigure: "It feels a bit strange somehow. Having a full course meal at home like this."  
Kashou: "No, no... To someone from another country, even typical Japanese home cooking might seem like kaiseki ryori (a traditional multi-course meal)."  
Kashou: "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat, fish... The number of plates used isn't that different, is it?"  
Shigure: "...You're right."

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Oh, I am Shigure Minaduki.」

It's hard trying to explain a concept I don't comprehend myself into French.

[嘉祥]: 「ううぅ……」
悩んでしまい、また思考がぐるぐると頭の中を回った。

reference_answer:

[Beignet]: 「There is some meaning behind him not explaining himself. You realize that, at least?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, somewhat.」

[Kashou]: 「Yes...」
I'm guess there's something I'm missing.
Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no! I cannot go back until I find something—anything.」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "Yeah, probably."

Kashou: "Yes..."
Perhaps there's something I'm lacking.

[Kashou]: 「But, as I worked through the day, I kind of started to remember the old days.」
[Kashou]: 「My desire from when I first started off to make Western sweets had resuscitated.」
ModelAnswer:
The cake was a new creation, and the taste was something I had never experienced before—but it was unmistakably my mentor's flavor…  
Fresh yet nostalgic.  
[Kashou]: "……It feels like I came to this town just to eat this."  
[Beignet]: "I hope you've calmed down a bit?"  
[Kashou]: "I don't know, but… did I really act that badly?"  
[Beignet]: "You had the face of a lost kitten."  
[Kashou]: "It's quite embarrassing."  
[Kashou]: "Honestly, when I was helping out at the shop, I sometimes wondered if this is what I should be doing…"  
[Kashou]: "I have to make a cake that will convince my father by Christmas…"  
[Kashou]: "But while working, I somehow recalled those old feelings."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "…I'm not Kashou's father, so I don't really understand. It might be true, or it might not."  
[Beignet]: "Words can sometimes even confuse the person who says them."  
[Beignet]: "After all, if 100 people hear something, there could be 100 different interpretations—that's what words are like."  
[Beignet]: "What matters isn't the words themselves…"  
[Beignet]: "Ah… I guess I talked too much."  
[Beignet]: "You must be exhausted after such a long journey and all that work. Why don't you take a shower and go to bed early?"  
[Beignet]: "Oh… sorry, I forgot. There's an empty room available, but the only free bed is the one Kashou used."  
[Beignet]: "Would it be okay if you shared it with him?"

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「言われてみれば……」

[嘉祥]: 「そういうものか？」
[時雨]: 「実家にある兄様の部屋は、私が毎日のように手入れしていますから万全です」

[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうか」
ベッドの寝心地は、毎日チェックする必要が……？
[時雨]: 「たぶんベニエさんは、また兄様が来るのをずっと待っていたのだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "It must be because you're often tending to it. A room that isn't used will deteriorate, after all."  
Kashou: "...You're right..."  
Shigure: "If you don't open the window daily or dust off things, it gets moldy quite quickly."  
Kashou: "I see..."  
Shigure: "The room of my older brother at his home is perfectly maintained because I take care of it every day."  
Shigure: "I open the windows to ventilate, wipe down the desk, and check the comfort of the bed."  
Kashou: "...So that's how it is..."  
*Is it really necessary to check the bed's feel every day...*  
Shigure: "Probably, Beignet-san has been waiting for my older brother to return all along."  
Kashou: "...I see..."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Tomorrow's another early day. Let's shower up and get to bed.」

[Kashou]: 「Of course not together. Hurry and take yours first.」

[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you're sick. You need a hospital ASAP.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Tomorrow's coming up fast. I'll take a shower and then go to bed."  
Shigure: "Eh? You want to shower together!? So... that's... my heart is already prepared..."  
Kashou: "That's not how it works, you know. Hurry up and take your shower."  
Shigure: "Hai!"  
Shigure: "Nya~o♪ Nyao? Nyaoun"  
Kashou: "Shigure is sick; we need to go to the hospital right away."  
Shigure: "I'm sorry. I got too excited and forgot to speak properly."  
Kashou: "Well, today was quite tiring after all."  
Shigure: "That's a wasteful thing to say. I was the one who came along without being invited."  
Kashou: "It's fine... I came here on my own too."

Shigure: "I-I'm fine… I just… Onii-sama was just too amazing…"
Kashou: "I swear I didn't do anything… You didn't do anything either, right?"
Shigure: "...Yes… From my side, I haven't even touched a single finger."
Kashou: "Well then, let's take a shower. You're sweating a lot. The sheets are soaked through."
Shigure: "I'm glad it was just sweat… I almost turned someone else's bed into a horror movie prop."
Kashou: "Nosebleed?"
Shigure gets up, adjusts her messy pajamas, and stumbles toward the shower room.

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「そうかな？」
[フレーズ]: 「ときどき、ぼーっとしてますけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……」
[フレーズ]: 「今の嘉祥さんは悩んでいて、考えなくちゃいけないことが、いっぱいあるんでしょうね……」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールから、少しだけ事情を聞きました」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中に、ぼんやりしていい理由にはならないけど」

[嘉祥]: 「なんと言ったらいいか……」
申し訳ないような、情けないような。もちろん、感謝の気持ちが一番大きいが。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou**: "I thought I had been working longer than you, but it seems Frise is quite efficient."  
**Fraise**: "Master is careful about the details. I want to learn from him."  
**Kashou**: "...Is that so?"  
**Fraise**: "Sometimes, he gets a bit distracted..."  
**Kashou**: "Uu..."  
**Fraise**: "I think Master is worried about something these days... there must be a lot on his mind."  
**Fraise**: "The pastry chef told me a little about the situation."  
**Kashou**: "Even so, daydreaming during work isn't an excuse..."  
**Fraise**: "Then I'll handle it."  
**Kashou**: "...What should I say...?"  
A mix of apologetic and pitiful feelings. Of course, the most important thing is gratitude.

[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」

[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」

[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "It's quite chaotic, brother! There's a line outside!"
Kashou: "Hmph... The number of customers has really increased from yesterday. It's almost like Christmas."
Shigure: "It was already a well-known shop among those who knew it, but I guess the buzz on social media really sparked things up."
Kashou: "Don't talk about personnel matters so casually."
Shigure: "Sorry. I didn't expect such a big effect from it."
Fraise: "Shigure... I think you're overdoing it."
Shigure: "What are you talking about, Fraise? It's not just me who's responsible for this."
Shigure: "You yourself have become quite the topic of conversation. Look! Here, here!"  
*Shigure holds up her smartphone, displaying numerous compliments towards Fraise.* Many customers can be seen heading to meet her. They’re likely part of the line forming at the store’s entrance…

食後――テーブルには、珈琲が並んでいる。

[Shigure]: 「I will!」
[Fraise]: 「Your cooking is always amazing, Pâtissière, but with Onii-san and Shigure-san around, you go the extra mile.」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I just can't help myself.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
Just like last night, we have a spectacular dinner.

metadata:

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no doubt about it. Because so many people looked up information after the topic became popular, and because the high evaluation as a top-rated store was widespread—it was a synergistic effect."  
[Kashou]: "As for me, I'm happy that more people got to know Master's wonderful cakes."  
[Fraise]: "Uu... If this continues tomorrow, it might be a bit troublesome..."  
[Beignet]: "Today was special, you see."  
[Beignet]: "A line like today probably won't happen again tomorrow."  
[Fraise]: "That's right... Tomorrow, it'll just be the pâtissier and me again."  
We were supposed to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is seven hours. To return home within our three-day agreement, we had to depart at this hour.  
In the end, I still didn't know what exactly I was lacking.  
Emotionally, I felt a lot better... but...

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」
[ベニエ]: 「結局、お役に立てなかったわね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、そんなことは！」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、この場所へ来て、お店を手伝って、思い出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、やっぱり、皆を笑顔にするケーキが作りたい」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の作るケーキは、本当に美味しくて、優しい味で……皆を笑顔にしてくれるんです」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがとう。そう言ってもらえて、嬉しいわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, sorry..."
Beignet: "In the end, I couldn't be of any help."
Minaduki Kashou: "No, that's not true!"
Minaduki Kashou: "Umm... well... I still don't really understand what my father means by 'the core'."
Minaduki Kashou: "But since coming here and helping with the shop, I remembered something."
Minaduki Kashou: "I guess I really do want to make cakes that make everyone smile."
Beignet: "...Thank you. It makes me happy to hear that."
Minaduki Kashou: "I've been thinking too much about various things... perhaps I forgot my original feelings?"
Minaduki Kashou: "While I say I'm aiming for something, it seems like I got caught up in other things."

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、俺がケーキを作る理由は、何度も話しているけれど……師匠のことは聞いたことがないですよね」
[ベニエ]: 「……そうね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、前に聞いたときは、ケーキを作る理由は、私がパティシエールだからって答えられたんですけど……」

[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "I told you before, I don't know the true intentions of Kashou's father, but I'm rooting for you."

Kashou: "Thank you."

Kashou: "By the way, I've mentioned many times why I make cakes... You haven't heard anything about Master, have you?"

Beignet: "...Yes."

Kashou: "Well, when I was asked before, I answered that it's because I'm a pastry chef..."

Beignet: "Hehe... Was that the case?"

Kashou: "Then why did you become a pastry chef in the first place?"

Beignet: "...This shop has been passed down from my grandmother's time. We've always made cakes here."

Beignet: "It may not be as grand as Kashou's house, but I believe there is a tradition worth protecting."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」

[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hmm? Wait, I did mention my family runs a wagashi shop, but did we talk about how historic it is?"
Though he planned to become an apprentice to learn Western confections, he had avoided mentioning that his family's wagashi shop was an established business...  
Beignet: "..."
Shigure: "Sorry, older brother! I thought you should know about your situation this morning."
Kashou: "Eh?"
Shigure: "I felt it necessary for you to be aware of things. It was rather presumptuous of me..."
Kashou: "No, no, it's fine. I wasn't hiding anything anyway."
Beignet: "Yes... Shigure told me about it earlier."
Kashou: "Oh, that's right. Sorry for going off-topic. You were saying there's a tradition at La Soleil, weren't you?"

[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そんなことがあったなんて……」
[ベニエ]: 「あの頃の私は、まだ若くて、賢明ではなかったわね。いくつものことを追いかけて……」
[ベニエ]: 「失ったあとに、何が一番大切だったのか、気付いたもの」
[フレーズ]: 「家族が……一番だったのですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね……私にとっての、お菓子は……息子が笑顔になってくれるものだった」
[ベニエ]: 「私が作っているお菓子は、幼い息子が美味しいと褒めてくれた味なのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「今も作り続けているのは、いつかまた息子が食べて喜んでくれるかもしれない、と思って」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう、未練なのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「あの……ご家族は、今は……？」
下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Something like that...?"
Beignet: "I was still young and not very wise back then. Chasing after so many things..."
Beignet: "It wasn't until I lost them that I realized what mattered most."
Fraise: "Family... Was it family you missed the most?"
Beignet: "Yes... For me, sweets were... things that made my son smile."
Beignet: "The pastries I make are ones my young son once praised for being delicious."
Beignet: "I keep making them now, hoping maybe one day my son will eat them and be happy again."
Beignet: "...That kind of lingering regret..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Um... What about your family now?"
He had been staying with me, helping out at the shop every day, but no phone calls or letters ever came from anyone resembling his family.

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「歳を取ってから、ようやく息子の気持ちを考えることができるようになったなんてね……」
[嘉祥]: 「気持ちを考える……」

[フレーズ]: 「歳なんて関係ないと思います、パティシエール」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……やっぱり、当時の師匠が、ただ失敗したとは思えません」
[嘉祥]: 「だって、もしも師匠が日本に残って、この街でパティスリーを再開していなかったら、俺は素晴らしい洋菓子に出会えなかった」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう考え方もあるわね」
[フレーズ]: 「わ、わたしもです！　パティシエールがいなかったら、今頃は……」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。フレーズには出会えなかったかもしれない」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「To think that I finally managed to consider my son's feelings after growing old...」
[Kashou]: 「Considering his feelings...」
[Shigure]: 「No matter how old I would get, I would want to meet my mother.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think age matters here, Pâtissière.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I... couldn't consider what you did at the time as a mistake.」
[Kashou]: 「I mean, if you had remained in Japan and hadn't resumed business as a patissiere here, I wouldn't have ever encountered such wonderful Western pastries.」
[Beignet]: 「...I suppose that is one way of thinking about it.」
[Fraise]: 「I-I agree! If you weren't around, Pâtissière, then we wouldn't...」
[Beignet]: 「That's true. We probably wouldn't have ever met.」
ModelAnswer:

[Kashou]: "Thinking about feelings…"
[Shigure]: "No matter how old I get, I want to meet Mother."
[Fraise]: "Age doesn't matter, Pastry Chef."
[Kashou]: "I… I still don’t think my former master was just a failure."
[Kashou]: "After all, if Master had stayed in Japan and reopened the pastry shop here, I wouldn’t have met such wonderful Western sweets."
[Beignet]: "...There's some truth to that way of thinking."
[Fraise]: "M-me too! If there hadn't been a Pastry Chef…"
[Beignet]: "Right. You might never have met Fraise."

[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「だって、あんなにも大勢のお客さんが、笑顔になっていたじゃありませんか」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがたいことにね」
[嘉祥]: 「昔の師匠が失敗したとは思えません。でも、息子さんの気持ちを考えてあげられなかったというのも事実なんだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「だけど、息子さんが大人になっているなら、師匠の気持ちだって考えてくれるんじゃないか、って」
[ベニエ]: 「それは、私にとって都合のいい空想ではなくて？」
[嘉祥]: 「かもしれません。でも、わからないことです。だから、俺は……息子さんに会ってみるべきだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「勝手なことを言って、すみません」
[フレーズ]: 「わたしも、お兄さんと同じように思います、パティシエール」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「After all, that huge crowd of people had smiles on each of their faces, did they not?」
[Beignet]: 「...Yes, thankfully.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」
[Kashou]: 「I apologize for speaking outside my boundaries.」
[Fraise]: 「My opinion is the same as Onii-san's, Pâtissière.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "After all, so many customers were smiling, weren't they?"  
[Beignet]: "...It's very kind of them."  
[Kashou]: "I don’t think the old master would’ve made such a mistake. But I also believe it’s true that he couldn’t consider his son’s feelings."  
[Kashou]: "But if the son has grown up, shouldn’t he at least consider the master’s feelings?"  
[Beignet]: "Isn’t that just a convenient fantasy for me?"  
[Kashou]: "Perhaps. But I don’t know. That’s why... I should go meet my son."  
[Kashou]: "I’m sorry for saying things so casually."  
[Fraise]: "I think the same way as my older brother, pâtissier."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「もう一度、考えてみるわね？」
[嘉祥]: 「……すみません、師匠。悲しい話をさせてしまいました」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……いつかは、話しておいたほうがいいと思っていたから」
[ベニエ]: 「貴方は道を間違えないと思うわ、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「俺が、道を？　……そうだと、いいのですが」
師匠は家族と離ればなれになったことを後悔している。
俺は自分から家を出て、両親とは疎遠になっていた。
母親の誕生日に言い争いをしたっきり、一度も連絡すら取っていない。
すでに道を間違えているような気がしなくもないが……
[ベニエ]: 「今の嘉祥には、パティシエとしての実力だけじゃなく、とても大切なものが身についているもの」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「But, I'll try thinking it over again, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「...Forgive me, Mentor. I didn't mean to make you tell such a sad tale.」
[Beignet]: 「No, I had been thinking I should talk about it eventually anyway.」
[Beignet]: 「I know you're on the right path, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Me? On the right path? Well, I'd... certainly like to think so.」
Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...
[Beignet]: 「Right now, you have not only mastered the skills of a capable pâtissièr, but something else very important.」
ModelAnswer:
BEIGNET: "Let's think about it again, shall we?"  
KASHOU: "...Sorry, Master. I made you hear a sad story."  
BEIGNET: "No... I actually thought it would be better to talk about this someday."  
BEIGNET: "I believe you won't go astray, Kashou."  
KASHOU: "Me? The path? ...That's good, isn't it?"  
The master regrets having been separated from his family. I had left home on my own and had become distant from my parents. There was even a fight with my mother on her birthday, and I hadn't contacted them since. It already felt like I might have taken the wrong path...  
BEIGNET: "Kashou now has not only the talent as a pastry chef but also something very precious."

[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」

[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Shigure, if it's too much, I'll take it from you. Just let me know before you overdo it."  
Shigure: "Ah..."  
Shigure: "Brother... you've changed a bit lately..."  
Kashou: "Huh? You're worrying about your younger sister who's carrying heavy luggage—haven't I always done that?"  
Kashou: "I don't think you'd become so callous. More like, you're just being overly nosy now..."  
Shigure: "Yes. Even now and in the past, Brother is incredibly kind and wonderful."  
Shigure: "But before, he would have said something like 'Let me carry that for you' without waiting for my words."  
Kashou: "Right... maybe?"  
Shigure: "That's also a very happy thing, and I did feel grateful. But..."  
Shigure: "...now, Brother is letting me make the decision."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:

Shigure: "Not just in recent days... I'm sure all the accumulated moments over time have changed your older brother, after all."
