The days spent with the cats and the master's words must have shaped who I am now.
Kashou: "Well, the master did tell me quite a story. I guess I learned something after all."
Shigure: "Did you learn anything?"
Kashou: "Maybe so. I even started thinking about why I make Western pastries in the first place."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」

ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "In the end, I guess I just want Father's recognition."  
Kashou: "At this age, isn't that a rebellious phase?"

Kashou: "Sorry, Shigure... Did I disappoint you?"

Shigure: "Maybe he does feel that way..."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Phew... It's getting pretty late, huh?"  
Shigure: "Yes, I thought we'd be back in time for dinner."  
The plane arrived slightly late, so we returned home at night. Since the cats were still at the store, Shigure also came to La Soleil with me instead of returning to the Minaduki household.  
Kashou: "This trip was really tough after all." And on top of that, it involved a lot of standing work over there.  
Shigure: "I'm perfectly fine. There's no need to worry about me, niisan." She forces a cheerful smile, though the signs of fatigue are unmistakable.  
Kashou: "You should rest at our place. In fact, you could even stay overnight and leave tomorrow if you want."  
Shigure: "Staying over?!"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "By the way, did you properly get permission from Shigure when she suddenly went to France?"
[Shigure]: "..."
[Cinnamon]: "Yeah... It was just a note left behind, so your mom got pretty angry, huh~?"
[Awayuki]: "Yeah, of course. She went off without consulting anyone, so we were worried."
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry..."
[Awayuki]: "But well, since Kashou was with her too..."
[Kashou]: "Heh... I was surprised too."
[Awayuki]: "Your mom forgave her because the financiers she brought back were delicious ♪"
Her mother gets angry in a way that's deeper than the sea and quieter than stillness, but if you give her something tasty to eat, she'll forgive almost anything.

Question:

全ての材料をフランスから取り寄せていたら、超高級店みたいな価格設定になってしまう。
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「Yes, from a shop called 'La Soleil' in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? You gave her my mentor's baked goods as a souvenir?!」
[Azuki]: 「Shigure?!」
[Shigure]: 「Th-The truth is... I could only fit one box in my carry-on case!」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama will make all the catgirls's portions. Isn't that right?」
[Kashou]: 「S-Sure... Can I even make it the same, though...?」
[Chocola]: 「Is your mentor's financier different in taste than yours, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「It is. Right down to the ingredients we use.」
If I were to get all my ingredients from France, we'd have to have some super high-class patisserie prices to recoup.
ModelAnswer:

[Azuki]: "Shigure—?"
[Shigure]: "I-I could only fit one box in my carry-on!"

[Kashou]: "...Ah... I see... Do you think he can make them just like this..."
[Chocola]: "Does Master's finnansee taste different from yours?"
[Kashou]: "Yeah. After all, we're using completely different ingredients."
If we were to source every single ingredient from France, the pricing would end up being that of a super high-end shop.

Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Waa, is this a Christmas present? Thank you so much, Mother!"
[Awayuki]: "It might be a bit early... but if Koushii gets angry again, he might go home upset."
[Shigure]: "Uu..."
[Kashou]: "S-so that's not today! Just trust me!"
[Awayuki]: "Yes, even for Koushii."
[Kashou]: "A-ah... thank you."
[Awayuki]: "Open it?"
He obediently took off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
[Kashou]: "...A photo frame?"
The box seemed to be empty inside.
[Awayuki]: "Why don't you put a picture from this year's memories on your room wall? I think it would make you happy."
Thinking back, he remembered that his mother had been wanting one, and Shigure had given it to him as a birthday present.
